platen-button-link.title: Button
platen-button-link.description: Add a button linking to another page or external site.

fields.name: selection
fields.title: Button Label Text
fields.description: Specify the Markdown text to render as the button's visible text.

fields.name: destination
fields.title: Button Destination
fields.description: Specify the URL this button should lead to. Alternatively, specify the dot-path of the preset you want to use after the prefix `preset:`, like `preset:foo`.

fields.name: label_icon
fields.title: Button Label Icon
fields.description: Specify the name of the icon you want to display instead of text for the button label.

fields.name: circle
fields.title: Display as Circle
fields.description: Specify whether the button should be rendered as a circle around an icon. Only valid when `label_icon` is set.

fields.name: class
fields.title: Class List
fields.description: Specify any classes to add to the button in a space-separated list. Each class must have a period (`.`) prefix.

fields.name: download_name
fields.title: File Download Name
fields.description: Use this attribute to tell the browser to download the linked file with this name.

fields.name: legacy
fields.title: Use Legacy Template
fields.description: Specify whether Platen should render this button with the legacy template.

fields.name: outline
fields.title: Render with Outline
fields.description: Specify whether Platen should render this button with an outline instead of as a solid block.

fields.name: pill
fields.title: Render as Pill
fields.description: Specify whether Platen should render this button with rounded corners.

fields.name: prefix_icon
fields.title: Prefix Icon
fields.description: Use this property to insert an icon before your label text.

fields.name: preset
fields.title: Preset
fields.description: Specify the dot-path of the button preset you want to use, if any.

fields.name: size
fields.title: Button Size
fields.description: Use this property to define the size of the rendered button.

fields.name: suffix_icon
fields.title: Suffix Icon
fields.description: Use this attribute to insert an icon before your label text.

fields.name: variant
fields.title: Button Variant
fields.description: Use this attribute to change the theme of the rendered button.
